# BA material file
#   Maxwell-Garnett approximations
#     r=.4, H=1.5, L=1
#     epsi = 3: 
#     eps_22=eps_33 = 1.40255
# 
units="normalized";
name="diskEps3BAH.txt";
omegaScale=2.997924580000000e+15;
materialType="bianisotropic";
dispersiveModel="none";
bianisotropicK0=[\
